struct.exostring: Second meeting (Bendak bragged) player not beaten Twitch

Player rejected death match offer
Dialog Mission Statement:
Player can speak to Bendak. Bendak will brag about his reputation. If Bendka Bounty plot is active player can try to take Bendak in. All this will be in vain if the player has not beaten Twitch (current champion) in the dueling ring.
Exit points:
1. Player leaves bendak, no scripting involved. 2. Player has beaten Twitch and accepts Bendak's challenge. Bendak will exit through the door to the duel ring and destroy himself and set his duel status to "pending". After two days the status of "pending" will change and the player will be able to fight Bendak in the duel ring by speaking to the duel organizer.
Bendak leaves through dueling ring door and destroys self. After 2 days duel status changes to "active" from pending and the player can battle Bendak by speaking with the duel manager.
